publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:46

did.unittitle: Visiting Faculty Program, Yale Summer and Special Programs, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of administrative and personnel files documenting the activities and operations of the Visiting Faculty Program of Yale Summer and Special Programs.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 15-B (YRG 15-B), Records of specific Yale summer and special programs.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Visiting Faculty Program, Yale Summer and Special Programs, Records (RU 502). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of administrative and personnel files documenting the activities and operations of the Visiting Faculty Program of Yale Summer and Special Programs.
